$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Winter20,Face|Whew! I'm exhausted... Oh, hey, you!
Yeah, you! I need a strong man here!$k$pWon't you please pass out some
of these presents for a poor,
helpless girl like me?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|You want...my help?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭フェリクス,ch17_14_Felix_M_Winter20,Face|Tch. Hilda, quit bothering people
you have never met. Have you no
shame at all?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Winter20,Face|Ugh... Looks like the taskmaster
found me. Fine, then! Whatever
you say, SIR.$k$p
$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|I apologize. Please, excuse me...$k$p$Sbs150|
